engine.graphics.font

Class TrueTypeFont

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.graphics.font.TrueTypeFont

  • public class TrueTypeFont
extends java.lang.Object
    A TrueType font implementation originally for Slick, edited for Bobjob's Engine
